name: Exit Bee
description:
Exit Bee is the first complete behavioral analysis and exit intent platform. We're on a mission to deliver the right message to the right user at the right time. 

With Smart Exit Ads we re-imagine what's possible in display advertising. From image and video ad campaigns to content, contests, lead generation and surveys, Smart Exit Ads maximize our clients' ad ROI. Our campaign viewability is double the viewability of an average banner ad and click-through rates are over 20 times higher.
We offer advertisers a new, premium and high-performing channel to reach their audience on trusted publishers. 
We offer publishers a brand new revenue stream by monetizing a "part" of their website that remained unutilized. 

With On-Site Retargeting we increase engagement, conversions and sales with tailored campaigns at the right time. Our clients use On-Site Retargeting to optimize their own website traffic by running behavioral, exit intent campaigns  On-Site Retargeting is a SaaS product.

jobs.title: Ad-Tech Product Manager
jobs.description:
About Exit Bee

We’re a rapidly growing startup and we just raised a 2nd round of funding. We’re building a premium ad network using behavioral analysis and exit intent to deliver the right message to the right user at the right time.

About the job

We’re looking for a Ad-Tech Product Manager to lead end-to-end product management efforts. You will help define the product strategy, develop the road map, identify requirements and take the product to market.

- Create product strategy documents that describe business cases, high-level use cases, technical requirements
- Translate product strategy documents into epics and detailed stories for the engineering teams to develop
- Consolidate, rationalize, and prioritize market requirements into product road map to define go to market strategy and timeline for product features and enhancements
- Identify and prioritize strategic integrations
- Rapidly iterate what works and correct what doesn’t
- Conduct market research and engage with customers, prospects and partners to identify market needs and opportunities
- Collaborate closely with engineering leaders and their teams through all stages of the product development; take on “Product Owner” role on a scrum team

Skills

- 3+ years of product management experience in ad-tech 
- Familiarity with the ad tech ecosystem, including DoubleClick for Publishers and SSP, DSP, and DMP
- Demonstrated ability to partner with engineering teams in a highly technical environment
- Detail-oriented with strong analytical abilities and problem-solving skills
- Excellent oral and written communication and interpersonal skills
- Experience with Agile software development / Scrum methodology
- Bias for shipping often and iterating quickly

Considered a  plus

- Experience working closely with Ad Platforms,  data platforms, data modeling, behavioral targeting technologies etc.
- Experience working with remote teams

jobs.title: Advertising Operations Manager
jobs.description:
Exit Bee is a rapidly growing Ad Tech startup that is growing its business internationally. We’re re-imagining what’s possible in display advertising using behavioral analysis and exit intent to deliver the right message at the right time.

Smart Exit Ads, is a new premium channel for advertisers to reach their audience on trusted publishers. Our campaigns have over 96% viewability and up to 30x times higher click-through rates compared to traditional display ad formats. 

We're entering a new and exciting growth phase and are looking for an Ad Operations Manager with hands on experience of campaign management.

You will work closely with our internal stakeholders and platform partners. You will be responsible for the daily campaign flight schedule and optimisation. Duties will include onboarding media, integration, reports preparation and troubleshooting. You will be the expert and go-to-person in providing the best solutions for meeting campaign goals and publisher requirements.

Responsibilities:

-Manage ad campaigns in order to achieve client KPIs and targets 
-Grow the ad operations team to high standards of excellence
-Play a pivotal role in our platform’s programmatic outreach on both advertiser and publisher sides
-Assist in the development of the platform’s UI, functionality and integrations
-Streamline media (publisher) process from onboarding to reporting and payouts
-Manage platform inventory to ensure data integrity and targeting consistency
-Troubleshooting and resolving of issues with the internal development team
-Support business development meetings with top-tiered supply and platform clients
-Take up ad-hoc projects to facilitate and improve operational flows
-Track campaigns to assess the impact of our ad technology and provide product insights

You have: 

-4 to 5 years of experience with campaign management on various DSPs and/or SSPs 
-Able to translate business needs into marketing or technical requirements
-Demonstrate understanding of the term of Yield optimisation
-At ease with implementing tracking codes 
-Experience in working with different teams across different time zones
-Comfortable working against timelines and managing multiple projects
-Able to work within a complex industry ecosystem and deal with ambiguity
-Excellent communication and relationship building skills
-A self-learner with the ability to grasp new concepts, both business and technical
-A listener who is partner and customer-oriented and attentive to their needs
-A team player with experience working with sales, product, and technology teams
-Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills
-Basic knowledge of programming languages such as Javascript, React, Python and API setups is a huge plus

jobs.title: DIGITAL SALES DIRECTOR - GERMANY
jobs.description:
Exit Bee is a rapidly growing Ad Tech startup with second 2nd round funding that is looking to grow its business internationally. We’re re-imagining what’s possible in display advertising using behavioral analysis and user exit intent to deliver the right message at the right time.

Smart Exit Ads is a new, premium channel for advertisers to reach their audience on trusted publishers. Our campaigns have over 96% viewability and up to 30 times higher click-through rates compared to traditional display ad formats. 

We're entering a new and exciting growth phase and are looking for an experienced digital media Sales Director with a strong business network to introduce Smart Exit Ads to the German market. Pro-activeness in pursuing and closing deals with media agencies and direct clients is a must. A solid understanding of the digital advertising ecosystem is required in order to manage a consultative pitch for each brand/advertiser. A talented relationship builder you’ll provide the best customer experience and communicate the way Smart Exit Ads can take display advertising to a new level.

Responsibilities

- Drive awareness and build Exit Bee’s profile with brands and media agencies
- Localise sales strategy in line with sales targets
- Exceed expectations in securing advertising campaigns from clients and media agencies
- Develop and implement quarterly sales plans activities for region and team
- Manage a robust sales pipeline and forecast new business 
- Develop annual agreements with key clients and agencies
- Lead and develop the German sales team
- Manage the entire sales cycle, including: identifying and nurturing leads; meeting prospects; developing value propositions; to closing deals and growing client accounts 
- Oversee and be accountable for win/loss reviews on new accounts
- Build lasting and profitable relationships with direct clients and media agencies alike 
- Proactively seek market feedback and work with our Product team to help develop market-leading functionality to meet the needs of our clients

Requirements

- 6+ years experience selling digital media to advertisers and agencies
- Experience in performance media/advertising and digital KPIs is required 
- 3+ years managing a sales team 
- Able to demonstrate success in the German market
- Experience in selling to top 50 brands and top 10 media/ad agencies
- Demonstrated successful track record in meeting or exceeding targets
- Success in navigating organizational hierarchies and engaging VP and C-level executives
- Contacts within digital publishing is a plus

jobs.title: Digital Account Director, Media Sales (London, UK)
jobs.description:
We’re a rapidly growing startup and we just raised a 2nd round of funding. We’re re-imagining what’s possible in display advertising using behavioral analysis and exit intent to deliver the right message to the right user at the right time.

Smart Exit Ads is a new, premium channel for advertisers to reach their audience on trusted publishers. Our campaigns have over 96% viewability and up to 30 times higher click-through rate compared to traditional display ad formats. We do this by identifying the moment users are more likely to engage with the ad.

We’re looking for an experienced and well connected Account Director to introduce Smart Exit Ads to the UK market, pursue, negotiate and close deals. You’ll need to tailor your pitch around the problems and needs of each brand or agency, make sure that they get the best customer experience and communicate the ways Smart Exit Ads can take their display advertising to a new level.

Responsibilities

- Raise awareness and build Exit Bee’s profile with brands and media agencies
- Lead the strategy and execution for the UK sales team
- Drive & execute sales within the UK by searching and identifying new business development opportunities
- Participate in all phases of the sales lifecycle, including: identifying and developing leads; meeting with clients; developing value propositions; financial deal structuring, and; contract negotiation and closing
- Independently build a large pipeline of leads
- Oversee and be accountable for win/loss reviews on new accounts
- Develop and implement quarterly sales plans and activities for your region and team
- Manage a robust pipeline and accurately forecast new business closure rate and revenue booked
- As deals close, work closely with the account managers to create lasting and profitable relationships
- Consistently achieve and exceed revenue goals
- Proactively seek market feedback and work with our Product team to help develop market-leading functionality that meets the needs of our potential clients

Requirements

- 7+ years experience selling digital media with a focus on performance media to advertisers and agencies
- 3+ years managing a team of sellers
- Able to demonstrate success in the UK market
- Experience selling to top 150 UK brands and/or top 10 media/ad agencies
- Demonstrated experience consistently meeting or exceeding target goals, hunting for deals, navigating organizational hierarchies and engaging VP and C-level executives to close business
- Exceptional presentation and communication skills
- Ability to interface with key decision makers at all levels at the brand and agency
- Technology-savvy and able to quickly learn what is needed to support successful implementation and optimization

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.description:
About Exit Bee
We’re a rapidly growing startup and we just raised a 2nd round of funding. We’re building a premium ad network using behavioral analysis and exit intent to deliver the right message to the right user at the right time.

About the job
As a Senior Software Engineer at Exit Bee, you’ll be at the heart of a technology company taking display advertising to a new level.

- Design, develop and maintain new and existing features of Exit Bee platform
- Lead architecture discussions, make and drive technical decisions
- Implement best practices and new solutions to create a stable, scalable, and innovative application
- Improve team processes, efficiency, and security

Skills
- At least 5+ years of experience in software engineering building web applications
- Expert skills in PHP
- Experienced with PHP frameworks – Laravel (preferably) or Symphony/CodeIgniter/Yii
- Experienced with RESTful APIs development
- Experienced with unit and integration testing
- Expert skills on MySQL 5.x, Apache2, HTML/CSS/Javascript/JQuery
- NoSQL technologies like Redis, Memcache
- Very comfortable with versioning systems
- Familiarity with docker
- Familiarity with CI/CD tools.
- Following PHP coding standards like PSR-*

Considered a  plus
- Familiarity with the ad tech ecosystem, including SSP, DSP, and DMP technologies
- Elasticsearch
- Google Cloud Platform
- Kubernetes
- Microservices
- Pub – Sub
- Machine Learning
